point.label: Nameplate Charge Capacity
point.description: Nameplate charge capacity in amp-hours.

point.label: Nameplate Energy Capacity
point.description: Nameplate energy capacity in DC watt-hours.

point.label: Nameplate Max Charge Rate
point.description: Maximum rate of energy transfer into the storage device in DC watts.

point.label: Namplate Max Discharge Rate
point.description: Maximum rate of energy transfer out of the storage device in DC watts.

point.label: Self Discharge Rate
point.description: Self discharge rate. Percentage of capacity (WHRtg) discharged per day.

point.label: Nameplate Max SoC
point.description: Manufacturer maximum state of charge, expressed as a percentage.

point.label: Nameplate Min SoC
point.description: Manufacturer minimum state of charge, expressed as a percentage.

point.label: Max Reserve Percent
point.description: Setpoint for maximum reserve for storage as a percentage of the nominal maximum storage.

point.label: Min Reserve Percent
point.description: Setpoint for maximum reserve for storage as a percentage of the nominal maximum storage.

point.label: State of Charge
point.description: State of charge, expressed as a percentage.

point.label: Depth of Discharge
point.description: Depth of discharge, expressed as a percentage.

point.label: Charge Status
point.description: Charge status of storage device. Enumeration.

point.label: Control Mode
point.description: Battery control mode. Enumeration.

symbol.label: Remote Control
symbol.description: Battery is controlled remotely (e.g. by the site controller).
symbol.notes: Value of 0 matches LocRemCtl in IEC 61850.

symbol.label: Local Control
symbol.description: Battery is controlled by a local operator (e.g. through battery HMI).
symbol.notes: Value of 1 matches LocRemCtl in IEC 61850.

point.label: Battery Heartbeat
point.description: Value is incremented every second with periodic resets to zero.

point.label: Controller Heartbeat
point.description: Value is incremented every second with periodic resets to zero.

point.label: Alarm Reset
point.description: Used to reset any latched alarms. 1 = Reset.
point.notes: Battery should reset to 0 when reset is complete.

point.label: Battery Type
point.description: Type of battery. Enumeration.

symbol.label: Not Applicable or Unknown
symbol.description: Battery type is not applicable or unknown.

symbol.label: Lead-Acid
symbol.description: Lead-acid battery type.

symbol.label: Nickel-Metal Hydrate
symbol.description: Nickel-metal hydrate battery type.

symbol.label: Nickel-Cadmium
symbol.description: Nickel-cadmium battery type.

symbol.label: Lithium-Ion
symbol.description: Lithium-ion battery type.

symbol.label: Carbon-Zinc
symbol.description: Carbon-zinc battery type.

symbol.label: Zinc Chloride
symbol.description: Zinc chloride battery type.

symbol.label: Alkaline
symbol.description: Alkaline battery type.

symbol.label: Rechargeable Alkaline
symbol.description: Rechargeable alkaline battery type.

symbol.label: Sodium-Sulfur
symbol.description: Sodium-sulfur battery type.

symbol.label: Flow
symbol.description: Flow battery type.

symbol.label: Other
symbol.description: Other battery type.

point.label: State of the Battery Bank
point.description: State of the battery bank. Enumeration.
point.notes: Must be reconciled with State in IEC 61850.

symbol.label: Disconnected
symbol.description: Battery bank is disconnected. All contactors are open.

symbol.label: Initializing
symbol.description: Battery bank is initializing but not ready for operating. String balancing may occur.

symbol.label: Connected
symbol.description: Battery bank is ready for operation. All enabled contactors are closed.

symbol.label: Standby
symbol.description: Battery bank is connected and in standby/power saving mode.

symbol.label: SoC Protection
symbol.description: Battery bank is connected but SoC is too low. Battery should be considered "offline".

symbol.label: Suspending
symbol.description: Battery bank is suspending operation and will disconnect.

symbol.label: Fault
symbol.description: The battery has experienced a critical failure and may not be operated.

point.label: Vendor Battery Bank State
point.description: Vendor specific battery bank state. Enumeration.

point.label: Cycle Count
point.description: Number of cycles executed in the battery.

point.label: State of Health
point.description: Percentage of battery life remaining.

point.label: Pad
point.description: Pad register.

point.label: Warranty Date
point.description: Date the device warranty expires.

point.label: Battery Event 1 Bitfield
point.description: Alarms and warnings. Bit flags.

symbol.label: Communication Error
symbol.description: Unable to communcate with BMS or BMS is unable to communicate with battery strings.

symbol.label: Over Temperature Alarm
symbol.description: Battery has exceeded maximum operating temperature

symbol.label: Over Temperature Warning
symbol.description: Battery is approaching maximum operating temperature.

symbol.label: Under Temperature Alarm
symbol.description: Battery has exceeded minimum operating temperature

symbol.label: Under Temperature Warning
symbol.description: Battery is approaching minimum operating temperature.

symbol.label: Over Charge Current Alarm
symbol.description: Battery maximum charge current has been exceeded.

symbol.label: Over Charge Current Warning
symbol.description: Approaching battery maximum charge current.

symbol.label: Over Discharge Current Alarm
symbol.description: Battery maximum discharge current has been exceeded.

symbol.label: Over Discharge Current Warning
symbol.description: Approaching battery maximum discharge current.

symbol.label: Over Voltage Alarm
symbol.description: Battery voltage has exceeded maximum limit.

symbol.label: Over Voltage Warning
symbol.description: Battery voltage is approaching maximum limit.

symbol.label: Under Voltage Alarm
symbol.description: Battery voltage has exceeded minimum limit.

symbol.label: Under Voltage Warning
symbol.description: Battery voltage is approaching minimum limit.

symbol.label: Under State of Charge Min Alarm
symbol.description: Battery state of charge has reached or exceeded SoCMin

symbol.label: Under State of Charge Min Warning
symbol.description: Battery state of charge is approaching SoCMin

symbol.label: Over State of Charge Max Alarm
symbol.description: Battery state of charge has reached or exceeded SoCMax

symbol.label: Over State of Charge Max Warning
symbol.description: Battery state of charge is approaching SoCMax

symbol.label: Voltage Imbalance Warning
symbol.description: A voltage imbalance exists between the strings in the battery bank.

symbol.label: Temperature Imbalance Alarm
symbol.description: A temperature imbalance exists between the strings in the battery bank.

symbol.label: Temperature Imbalance Warning
symbol.description: A temperature imbalance is developing between the strings in the battery bank.

symbol.label: Contactor Error
symbol.description: A contactor failed to open or close as requested.

symbol.label: Fan Error
symbol.description: One or more battery fans has failed.

symbol.label: Ground Fault Error
symbol.description: Ground fault detected.

symbol.label: Open Door Error
symbol.description: One or more doors are open.

symbol.label: Current Imbalance Warning
symbol.description: A current imbalance exists between the strings in the battery bank.

symbol.label: Other Battery Alarm
symbol.description: A vendor specific alarm has occurred.
symbol.notes: See EvtVnd1 and EvtVnd2 for more information.

symbol.label: Other Battery Warning
symbol.description: A vendor specific warning has occurred.
symbol.notes: See EvtVnd1 and EvtVnd2 for more information.

symbol.label: Reserved
symbol.description: Reserved bit.

symbol.label: Configuation Alarm
symbol.description: The battery bank has been configured incorrectly and will not operate.

symbol.label: Configuation Warning
symbol.description: The battery bank has been configured incorrectly and may not operated as expected.

point.label: Battery Event 2 Bitfield
point.description: Alarms and warnings. Bit flags.

point.label: Vendor Event Bitfield 1
point.description: Vendor defined events.

point.label: Vendor Event Bitfield 2
point.description: Vendor defined events.

point.label: External Battery Voltage
point.description: DC Bus Voltage.

point.label: Max Battery Voltage
point.description: Instantaneous maximum battery voltage.
point.notes: If not implemented, must implement AChaMax and ADisChaMax.

point.label: Min Battery Voltage
point.description: Instantaneous minimum battery voltage.
point.notes: If not implemented, must implement AChaMax and ADisChaMax.

point.label: Max Cell Voltage
point.description: Maximum voltage for all cells in the bank.

point.label: Max Cell Voltage String
point.description: String containing the cell with maximum voltage.

point.label: Max Cell Voltage Module
point.description: Module containing the cell with maximum voltage.

point.label: Min Cell Voltage
point.description: Minimum voltage for all cells in the bank.

point.label: Min Cell Voltage String
point.description: String containing the cell with minimum voltage.

point.label: Min Cell Voltage Module
point.description: Module containing the cell with minimum voltage.

point.label: Average Cell Voltage
point.description: Average cell voltage for all cells in the bank.

point.label: Total DC Current
point.description: Total DC current flowing to/from the battery bank.

point.label: Max Charge Current
point.description: Instantaneous maximum DC charge current.
point.notes: Calculation which is always unsigned (i.e. magnitude only). If not implemented, must implement VMax and VMin.

point.label: Max Discharge Current
point.description: Instantaneous maximum DC discharge current.
point.notes: Calculation which is always unsigned (i.e. magnitude only). If not implemented, must implement VMax and VMin.

point.label: Total Power
point.description: Total power flowing to/from the battery bank.

point.label: Inverter State Request
point.description: Request from battery to start or stop the inverter. Enumeration.
point.notes: Used in special states such as manual battery charging.

symbol.label: No Request
symbol.description: Battery has no requests of the inverter.

symbol.label: Start Inverter
symbol.description: Battery requests that the inverter be started.
symbol.notes: Battery is notified of inverter state change through SetInvState.

symbol.label: Stop Inverter
symbol.description: Battery requests that the inverter be stopped.
symbol.notes: Battery is notified of inverter state change through SetInvState.

point.label: Battery Power Request
point.description: AC Power requested by battery.
point.notes: Used in special states such as string balancing.

point.label: Set Operation
point.description: Instruct the battery bank to perform an operation such as connecting. Enumeration.

symbol.label: Connect the Battery Bank
symbol.description: Initialize the battery bank and close contactors for all enabled strings.

symbol.label: Disconnect the Battery Bank
symbol.description: Open contactors for all strings.

point.label: Set Inverter State
point.description: Set the current state of the inverter.
point.notes: Information needed by battery for some operations.

point.description: Scale factor for charge capacity.
Scale factor for energy capacity.
Scale factor for maximum charge and discharge rate.
Scale factor for self discharge rate.
Scale factor for state of charge values.
Scale factor for depth of discharge.
Scale factor for state of health.
Scale factor for DC bus voltage.
Scale factor for cell voltage.
Scale factor for DC current.
Scale factor for instantationous DC charge/discharge current.
Scale factor for AC power request.

point.label: Pad
point.description: Pad register.
